sentence: For Beauty Brand ’ s non-employees, share-based expense is recorded in accordance with Emerging Issues Task Force No. 96-18, “ Accounting for Equity Instruments That Are Issued to Other Than Employees for Acquistion, or in Conjunction with Selling, Goods or Services. ”
